name: Might of the Living Spaghetti
description:
Swallowed up by his dreams, Leo is desperate to find the memories of his lost love so that they might reunite. Guide Leo and avoid falling into the void, where he may drift into a loop of regret!

In order to navigate Leo's dream's, collect memories to reveal a passage into another dream. 

Purple memories will take you deeper into his psyche.

Golden memories will allow you to retrace your steps.
